channel.title: [PI] Compiler Issues, Need Help! [PI]
channel.description: Hey, my compiler wont compile my npc.cfg file. heres my compile code [code]@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build[/code] any help appreciated

item.title: [PI] Compiler Issues, Need Help! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @partykid partykid
item.description:
@partykid wrote:

yes thats correct. thank you very much, i would rep if i could (not enough rep pts)
and shouldnt the *.java go after Npcs\ ?

item.title: [PI] Compiler Issues, Need Help! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

*.java src\server\model\Npcs\

add that code to your compiler also it might be NPCS it has to be the correct folder just check and make sure im right

item.title: [PI] Compiler Issues, Need Help! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @partykid partykid
item.description:
@partykid wrote:

Hey, my compiler wont compile my npc.cfg file. heres my compile code

@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build
any help appreciated

Read full topic
